Text: Visit the Great Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx.
Guided tour through the Egyptian Museum.
Explore Karnak Temple and Luxor Temple.
Visit the Valley of the Kings and Hatshepsut Temple.
Tour Philae Temple and learn about Nubian culture.
Relaxing boat trip on the Nile.
Snorkeling in the Red Sea coral reefs.
Professional equipment provided for all participants.
Swim with dolphins in their natural habitat.
Dune bashing and camel riding in the desert.
BBQ dinner under the stars with live entertainment.
